definition: (of a bird) to perch/(of creatures in general) to inhabit/to dwell
to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Happy is a bird, it found only in fulfillment of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 快樂的是一隻鳥，它只棲息在花繁葉茂的樹上。

sentences.english: Zhalong is the ideal home for cranes and many other endangered birds.
sentences.chinese: 扎龍是鶴和其它瀕危鳥類的理想棲息地。

sentences.english: Bald eagles and ospreys roost in the old cottonwoods that line the gravel shores.
sentences.chinese: 禿鷹和魚鷹在礫石河岸邊的棉白楊林中棲息下來。

sentences.english: The expansion of agricultural land is destroying tigers’ habitats and food supply.
sentences.chinese: 農耕用地不斷擴大，破壞了老虎的棲息地和食物來源。

sentences.english: Gannets are denizens of the open ocean .
This is the only home of the red Colobus monkey but there are very few left.
sentences.chinese: 這是紅色疣猴的唯一棲息地，但是現在所剩無幾了。

sentences.english: Gusseted tongue keeps debris in its natural habitat.
sentences.chinese: 插角舌頭保持在其自然棲息地的碎片。

sentences.english: The second largest habitat was designed to copy the natural environment of beluga whales.
sentences.chinese: 第二大棲息地是摹仿白鯨的自然生活環境而設計的。
我們還侵佔它們的棲息地，鋪路蓋房子。

sentences.english: Both are designated primarily for migrating and wintering birds.
sentences.chinese: 它們都主要是過路和越冬鳥類的棲息地。

sentences.english: Inhabits coastal rocky and coral reefs (Ref. 9710).
sentences.chinese: 棲息於海岸的岩石與珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: It was quite at home, as if it were perching on a twig .
sentences.chinese: 它看起來很自在，就好像是棲息在一根樹枝上一樣。

sentences.english: Birds rest in wild verdure where dusk forgets Qin's courts of yore;
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒棲息在野綠之中，此處的黃昏遺忘了古代的秦苑。

sentences.english: Did ever dragon keep so far a cave?
sentences.chinese: 哪一條惡龍曾經棲息在這清雅的洞府裏？

sentences.english: It is a natural grazing land. Every early summer, flocks of wild ducks fly here, perching and breeding.
sentences.chinese: 每當夏初，成羣的野鴨飛來棲息，繁殖後代。

sentences.english: We have planted insectaries between our olive trees to provide year-round habitat for our insectivorous guests.
sentences.chinese: 在橄欖樹之間建造昆蟲館提供整年的昆蟲棲息地。

definition: to forage/to hunt for food/to scavenge/fig. to make a living
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to come and go/to roam about (mostly unseen)/(of a ghost) to haunt (a place)/(of a criminal) to stalk (the streets)/(of the sun) to rise and set
